wikitext.*:
'''Robert Foster''' ([[September 6]], [[1949]]) is the author of ''[[The Complete Guide to Middle-earth]]'' which is looked highly upon by the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] community.

==Bibliography==
* ''[[The Complete Guide to Middle-earth]]'', also known as:
** ''The Guide to Middle-earth''
** ''The Complete Guide to Middle-Earth: Tolkien's World from A to Z''
** ''The Complete Guide to Middle-Earth: From the Hobbit Through the Lord of the Rings and Beyond''
** ''Complete Guide to Middle Earth: From "the Hobbit" to "the Silmarillion"''
** ''The Complete Guide to Middle-earth: The Definitive Guide to the World of J.R.R. Tolkien''
